mangaName: Uchi no Hentai Maid ni Osowareteru
alternativeNames: My Hentai Maid is Assaulting Me
My Perverted Maid is Attacking Me
うちの変態メイドに襲われてる
author: Saku
description: Spring has come. I, Haruto, am now a university student, and I'm living on my own in an apartment. However, my father suddenly sent me a "maid" because he was worried about me. This maid is a huge pervert with a dirty mind who spends every day assaulting me with her provocative behavior.
